backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing user profiles, approval workflow, access control, and payment proof submission with storage integration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend source file in the project.
frontend/android/.gitignore: Gitignore rules excluding Android build outputs, signing files, IDE metadata, and generated project files.
frontend/android/README.md: Documentation explaining the Android TWA wrapper setup, prerequisites, and build process for APK packaging.
frontend/android/scripts/build-apks.mjs: Node script that builds debug and release Android APKs, validates signing config, and copies artifacts for CI.
frontend/android/scripts/validate-releas: Validation script ensuring TWA manifest, asset links, and signing files are correctly configured before release builds.
frontend/android/signing/keystore.proper: Template file showing required fields for Android signing configuration without real credentials.
frontend/android/twa-manifest.json: TWA manifest defining Android wrapper metadata, host URL, colors, icons, signing info, and SDK configuration.
frontend/docs/android-apk-build.md: Guide explaining prerequisites and steps for building debug and release APKs using Bubblewrap for the PWA.
frontend/env.json: Environment config storing backend canister ID and II derivation origin.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the PWA manifest, icons, and main React script.
frontend/public/.well-known/assetlinks.j: Digital Asset Links file declaring app package and certificate for TWA verification.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, colors, icons, and splash screen.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing asset caching, cache cleanup, and offline fallbacks.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component wiring modules, reminders, service worker registration, and logout logic.
frontend/src/backend/backend.did.ts: Candid interface defining the backend healthCheck method.
frontend/src/backend/index.ts: Factory for creating backend actors using HttpAgent with optional identity.
frontend/src/backend/types.ts: Custom TypeScript definitions for backend approval status variants.
frontend/src/components/Debug/Diagnostic: Diagnostics UI showing captured logs with copy and clear actions.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary displaying error details and offering reload and copy options.
frontend/src/config/branding.ts: Centralized branding strings like app name and descriptions.
frontend/src/config/pixPaywall.ts: Pix paywall configuration including amount, key, and instructions.
Controls user access flow based on authentication, profile, approval, and payment status.
frontend/src/features/access/components/: Renders standardized error states for access issues with optional retry and support actions. Supports network, disabled, unauthorized, and pending cases.
frontend/src/features/access/hooks/useAc: Computes the user's access state by combining authentication, profile, approval, admin role, and paywall checks. Returns a structured gate status used for routing and gating UI.
frontend/src/features/access/PaywallStat: Displays paywall or payment review status based on the user's latest payment proof. Shows loading, pending, rejected, or approved states.
frontend/src/features/admin/AdminPanel.t: Provides the admin interface for managing user approvals and reviewing payment proofs. Displays tabs for approvals and payments with support for viewing detailed proof data.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/P: Drawer UI for admins to review and approve or reject a specific payment proof. Shows proof details, status badges, and mutation actions.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/U: Lists user approvals with filtering and allows admins to approve or reject pending users. Handles loading, error states, and displays status badges for each entry.
frontend/src/features/admin/hooks/useAdm: Provides admin hooks for listing and updating approvals, managing payment proofs, and assigning user roles. Wraps backend mutation and query hooks for admin operations.
frontend/src/features/auth/AuthScreen.ts: Login screen prompting users to authenticate via Internet Identity. Shows branding, login button, and loading state during authentication.
frontend/src/features/auth/ProfileSetupF: Form component that captures and validates user name and email, then saves the profile via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/componen: Displays full boleto details with edit, delete, WhatsApp, and status update actions.
Form for creating or editing a boleto with fields for client info, due date, value, status, and notes.
Alarm overlay showing an expiring boleto and providing snooze or mark-as-sent actions.
Main dashboard view that lists boletos, applies filters, shows metrics, and supports creating and viewing boleto details.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/context/: Context managing boleto state with CRUD operations, status updates, snoozing, and persistent storage.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/model/cl: Defines the ClientBoleto interface, boleto status types, and associated labels and colors.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/reminder: React hook that checks pending boletos for due reminders and exposes an active reminder with a dismiss function.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/storage/: LocalStorage wrapper for loading, validating, saving, and modifying ClientBoleto entries.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/utils/al: Utility to play and stop an 800Hz pulsing alarm sound using the Web Audio API.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/utils/du: Functions to bucket boletos by due date and filter by status, including labels and sorting.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/utils/mo: Calculates dashboard metrics for pending boletos and provides a currency formatting helper.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/utils/wh: Normalizes phone numbers and opens WhatsApp links with platform‑specific deep‑link handling.
frontend/src/features/leads/components/L: Lead details panel with view, edit, delete, and WhatsApp actions, pulling latest data from context.
Form for creating and editing leads with validation and status, phone, notes, and follow‑up fields.
UI overlay for due follow-up reminders, showing lead info and allowing snooze or completion actions.
Displays searchable, filterable lead list grouped by follow-up buckets with quick actions.
Main leads module wiring list, details panel, and creation dialog using context state.
frontend/src/features/leads/context/Lead: Manages lead state, CRUD operations, follow-up updates, and persistence via local storage.
frontend/src/features/leads/model/lead.t: Defines Lead interface, status type, and label/color mappings.
frontend/src/features/leads/reminders/us: Hook that detects due leads and exposes the active reminder with dismissal handling.
frontend/src/features/leads/storage/lead: LocalStorage-backed persistence layer for loading, saving, and updating leads.
frontend/src/features/leads/utils/follow: Utility functions to classify, filter, sort, and label leads by follow-up timing.
frontend/src/features/leads/utils/snooze: Provides preset snooze durations and helper to compute next follow-up time.
frontend/src/features/leads/utils/whatsa: Normalizes phone numbers and generates or opens WhatsApp deep links.
frontend/src/features/paywall/hooks/useP: Provides helpers to fetch, submit, and update the user's latest payment proof using backend mutations.
frontend/src/features/paywall/PaywallScr: Renders the paywall UI, handles file or code submission for payment proofs, and shows the latest proof status.
frontend/src/features/settings/SettingsM: Displays user profile details, logout actions, and conditionally renders the admin panel if the user is an admin.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance based on the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth flow, exposing identity, login, logout, and status through a React context provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend calls with React Query for user profiles, roles, approvals, paywall checks, and payment proof operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/logCapture.ts: Captures console errors, warnings, and uncaught exceptions into an in-memory log buffer for diagnostics.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering the root component.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL and hash parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, extended color tokens, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines current project state, goals, architecture notes, known issues, and feature list for an offline-first Android reminder/CRM app with restricted access.
